opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Curry v. Cockrell, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division

opinion:
537 U.S. 1180

CURRY
v.
COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.

No. 02-8702 (02A620).

Supreme Court of United States.

January 28, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 5th Cir. Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Certiorari denied.
